sen.e: Although he was a government official, this awareness made him wrote many poems by keenly observing the weak in the society, such as farmers burdened with heavy tax and a wife whose husband was recruited as a sakimori (soldiers deployed for boarder defenses), and therefore known as a socialist poet that was rare in his days.
